entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can a File Stream open a File Larger than 5 Terabytes? #65602
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests crashing on MacCatalyst #65601
  • Configuration data allows nullable values, but ChainedConfigurationProvider.TryGet doesn't work correctly with them #65594
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to save configurations in IConfiguration #65593
  • Revisit PatternContext<TFrame>.PushDataFrame nullable annotation #65590
    7.0.0
  • R2R ignores AdvSimd on ARM64 #65587
    7.0.0
  • Failures seen in nightly PGO runs #65585
  • API proposal for SP800-108-CTR-HMAC cryptographic algorithm #65577
    7.0.0
  • System.Collections.Immutable.Tests on Wasm failing intermittently with Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:1990, condition `<disabled>' not met #65574
  • ILVerify.IResolver with AssemblyName #65573
  • Reconsider tracing functionality when EventSource is disabled #65570
  • [NativeAOT] Console app NativeAOT published failed #65568
  • Define RIDs for CBL-Mariner #65566
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Lookup<TKey, TElement>.Empty` and other static factories #65565
    Future
  • SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated returns wrong value when cached creds are used #65563
  • CLR msbuild builds fail with unresolved external symbol RedirectedHandledJITCaseForGCStress_Stub #65562
  • [iOS/tvOS Simulator][x64] System.Tests.AppDomainTests.TestingCreateInstanceFromObjectHandle test failed #65560
    7.0.0
  • Blazor webassembly startup speed and UI locking issue #65559
  • [Android][x86] System.Reflection.Emit.Tests.ModuleBuilderDefineInitializedData.DefineInitializedData_EnsureAlignmentIsMinimumNeededForUseOfCreateSpan failed #65558
  • [Android][x86] System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.NFloatTests failed #65557
  • Visual Studio restore is broken as projects are missing from the dependency closure #65552
  • Optimization of array bounds checks involving bitwise AND could be improved #65550
  • Change default of SslServerAuthenticationOptions.AllowRenegotiation to be false #65547
  • mark SslProtocols.Tls and SslProtocols.Tls11 as obsolete #65546
  • mark EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption as obsolete #65545
    7.0.0
  • Unify thread cleanup on use of TlsDestructionMonitor #65543
  • Implementing async/await using source generators #65540
  • SslStream_RequireClientCert_IsMutuallyAuthenticated_ReturnsTrue failing on Windows 11 #65539
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.DeflateStreamUnitTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #65538
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm][aot][windows] Crash in `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Tests` #64725
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] V8/linux - assertion `src/mono/mono/metadata/class-accessors.c:92` in `System.Linq.Tests` #64774
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] runtime crashes in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests` #65337
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][windows] System.Threading.Channels.Tests failing with `RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds` on v8, chrome, and node. #65012
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `remainder by zero` crash in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests`, on browser #65245
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Runtime crashes in `System.Text.Json` #65336
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Assertion in `mono_metadata_generic_inst_hash` for `System.Text.Json` tests #65243
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] V8/Linux `RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds` for `System.Text.Json.Tests` #64775
  • [wasm][aot] `memory access out of bounds` crash in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` with `v8` #65242
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Interpreter assertion at `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3874`, for `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #64917
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #64916
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] sgen assertion with in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #64769
  • [wasm] Multiple runtime crashes, and asserts in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` #65335
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] running tests on NodeJs fails with `globalThis is not defined` #65485
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #65383
  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34587 crashes Crossgen2 compilation with an assertion failure #63818
  • Static class initialization throws TypeInitializationException #65575

PullRequests

Created

  • Change regex source generator to emit returns rather than jumps to NoMatch #65599
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Revisit `PatternContext<TFrame>.PushDataFrame` nullable annotation #65598
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't mark prefldinit4 as requiring process isolation #65596
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Auto-update `src/libraries` solutions #65595
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Propagate native references to merged project wrapper outputs #65592
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix HelperMethodFrame::UpdateRegDisplay on x86 #65589
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Faster Math.Max/Min on arm64 #65584
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • Suppress some new trimmer warnings #65580
    linkable-framework
  • Always build ref pack even in servicing releases #65579
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-preview2] Class types with layout that inherit from System.Object should be ManagedSequential #65578
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Roll out automated issue cleanup #65576
    area-Meta
  • Remove bounds checks, improving performance #65572
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65569
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve NamedPipeClientStream.Connect edge cases handling #65553
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Move iOS/tvOS simulator and Android emulator legs from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Update GeneratedDllImportAttribute CharSet -> StringMarshalling #65544
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65537
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65536
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Make the sanitize pass less aggressive #65571
    area-Build-mono
  • Disable System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogRecordTests.ExceptionOnce on Windows Server 2022 #65588
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • [wasm] Implicit NodeJS version on Helix #65514
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve SuperPMI script robustness #65586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean-up slngen related logic #65507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip RegexOptions.NonBacktracking phase 3 for some patterns #65531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated in R2R binaries #65351
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Class types with layout that inherit from System.Object should be ManagedSequential #65447
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix an incorrect assert #65564
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Forward DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute to the inner P/Invoke. #65458
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • New Arcade Installers package with Mariner cm.2 change #65542
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure NodeJS for running tests isn't too old #65549
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve PipeWriterTests.CompleteWithLargeWriteThrows #65506
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Support resumable serialization in NullableConverter<T> #65524
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix XNodeReaderFunctionalTests #65500
    area-System.Xml
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Replace active issue for browser platform with NodeJS only #65505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use CopyContext to restore saved context on X86 #65490
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Cache aotdata file in AOTCompiler task #65472
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Link the aot profiler into dotnet.wasm by default in deb… #63262
    area-Build-mono
  • Add line break to please Firefox #65529
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Disable wasm aot tests hitting OOM on all platforms #65521
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test
  • [wasm] Rollback emscripten to 2.0.23 #65517
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove ExactSpelling from GeneratedDllImport #65343
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Always dispose inner stream in StreamPipeWriter.Complete* #65462
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Trigger all wasm jobs, if `eng/Version.Details.xml` has any chan… #65451
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Trace Samplers to Modify the Activity Trace State #65530
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Bump next from 11.1.3 to 12.1.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-nextjs #65534
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Fix --break #65467
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65328
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Make sure WinHttpHandler 6.0.1 is released #65523
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix stacktrace from DIM #65509
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • FIX | Adds support for Shim gss api on Linux to delay loading libgssapi_krb… #65469
    area-System.Net
  • [No review] NativeAOT CoreCLR testing #65491
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
